description.name: 1/2 in. Socket Rail Organizer with Clips
description.long_desc:
Socket Rail consists of 14 piece 1/2 in. socket holders.

  • Number of Clips: 14

  • Clips Size: 1/2"

  • Material: Steel

category.name: General Mechanical Tools
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\General Mechanical Tools

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\General Mechanical Tools

description.name: 9pcs Torx Tip Socket Set T10-T60 CrV 1/4 in. Drive
description.long_desc:
9 pcs Torx Tip Socket Set T10-T60 CrV 1/4 in. Drive. Set includes 9-piece Torx socket bits: T10, T15, T20, T27, T30, T40, T45, T50, T60. This set is supplied on a Stainless Steel rail to keep bits organized.


Product Features



  • Made from Chrome Vanadium Alloy Steel

  • Fit all TORX and star screws

  • Set includes 9-piece Torx socket bits: T10, T15, T20, T27, T30, T40, T45, T50, T60

  • Drive size: 1/4 inch

  • Package Type: blister
description.short_desc:

category.name: Special Sockets
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Socket Wrenches and Accessories\Special Sockets

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Socket Wrenches and Accessories\Special Sockets

description.name: Universal Socket Adapter CrV 7-19 + Power Drill Adapter
description.long_desc:
Universal socket was designed to automatically adjust to fit any nut or bolt from 7-19 mm (1/4 inches to 3/4 inches). Works with various shapes of screws, nuts, hooks, lag screws, eye screws, bolt heads and even broken, stripped and rusted nuts.


Product Features



  • Includes a 3/8" power adapter for electric drill or screwdriver

  • 54 steel pins automatically adjusts to any shape


Technical Data



  • Size Range: 7 - 19 mm / 1/4 - 3/4 in.

  • Socket Length: 52 mm

  • Drive Size: 3/8 inch

  • Drive Type: Square

  • Material: Chrome Vanadium Steel
description.short_desc:
